Description:
Before deploying any new asset, change all default passwords to have values consistent with administrative level accounts.
Sigma detects default credentials usage. Sigma for Qualys vulnerability scanner. Scan type - Vulnerability Management.


Author: Alexandr Yampolskyi, SOC Prime
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Default Credentials Usage
Query: sourcetype like 'qualys-%' eql select * from _source_ where (host.scan.vuln = '10693' or host.scan.vuln = '11507' or host.scan.vuln = '11633' or host.scan.vuln = '11804' or host.scan.vuln = '11821' or host.scan.vuln = '11847' or host.scan.vuln = '11867' or host.scan.vuln = '11931' or host.scan.vuln = '11935' or host.scan.vuln = '11950' or host.scan.vuln = '12541' or host.scan.vuln = '12558' or host.scan.vuln = '12559' or host.scan.vuln = '12560' or host.scan.vuln = '12562' or host.scan.vuln = '12563' or host.scan.vuln = '12565' or host.scan.vuln = '12587' or host.scan.vuln = '12590' or host.scan.vuln = '12599' or host.scan.vuln = '12702' or host.scan.vuln = '12705' or host.scan.vuln = '12706' or host.scan.vuln = '12907' or host.scan.vuln = '12928' or host.scan.vuln = '12929' or host.scan.vuln = '13053' or host.scan.vuln = '13178' or host.scan.vuln = '13200' or host.scan.vuln = '13218' or host.scan.vuln = '13241' or host.scan.vuln = '13253' or host.scan.vuln = '13274' or host.scan.vuln = '13296' or host.scan.vuln = '13301' or host.scan.vuln = '13327' or host.scan.vuln = '13373' or host.scan.vuln = '13374' or host.scan.vuln = '13409' or host.scan.vuln = '13530' or host.scan.vuln = '13532' or host.scan.vuln = '20065' or host.scan.vuln = '20073' or host.scan.vuln = '20081' or host.scan.vuln = '27202' or host.scan.vuln = '27358' or host.scan.vuln = '38702' or host.scan.vuln = '38719' or host.scan.vuln = '42045' or host.scan.vuln = '42417' or host.scan.vuln = '43029' or host.scan.vuln = '43220' or host.scan.vuln = '43221' or host.scan.vuln = '43222' or host.scan.vuln = '43223' or host.scan.vuln = '43225' or host.scan.vuln = '43246' or host.scan.vuln = '43431' or host.scan.vuln = '43484' or host.scan.vuln = '86857' or host.scan.vuln = '87098' or host.scan.vuln = '87106')
